title: Montessori Teaching - Exercise of Practical Life (EPL)
headline: Learn how Montessori teaching techniques prepare children for practical life in this free online course.
description: The Montessori curriculum provides a solid foundation for a child’s future by taking their natural capabilities - concentration, coordination and muscle movement - and developing them according to the individual. In addition, each classroom contains materials designed to enhance these capabilities. Created to teach learners how to use these materials, this course aids you in preparing and equipping children for practical life.
courseDescription:
The methods of teaching children devised by Dr Maria Montessori a century ago are still relevant and much in demand today. These involve using various materials to help children shape their future by building the necessary foundations. Children learn about life's everyday routines and practices through these practical life materials and teaching methods. These routines include hand washing, preparing food, dressing oneself and more.

Doing practical life activities helps enhance the Montessori students' basic capabilities, such as improving their motor muscle skills, concentration and coordination. Montessori Pro and Alison combined their resources and designed this cohesive course to merge all necessary Montessori materials that teach these practices and enhance children's skills. By integrating all these materials, you gain essential insights into how to implement them in the Montessori classrooms.

This course contains descriptions of various practical life objects and how children can use them. It also remarks on the impact these activities have on their life. Finally, the last two topics of this course list how Montessori can teach youngsters to conserve the environment and take care of themselves independently. So don't wait any longer and enrol in this course to advance your teaching skills with this practical Montessori course.
